about.title: Oakland Portal
about.description: The GoPort/Oakland Portal freight ITS information system/app provides an integrated system of real-time traveller information,notifications and resources for Port users,such as truckers,dispatchers, and staff at the port of Oakland.

subtopic.moduleDescription: Access pregate wait times, turn times,and camera views for real-time conditions at each terminal.
Determine which vessels are en-route, at the Port,due to arrive and due to depart.
See real-time and regional traffic conditions and camera views. alongside weather conditions at the Port .Access details of local and regional message signs. closures, and incidents.
Know instantly Which rail crossings Within the Port are inaccessible.
Reserve parking spots in advance and get reminders of upcoming container pick-up appointments.
See amount due in parking fees
Access compliance reminders. weigh-in-motion readings, and critical alerts.
